meanings.sent1: The unbaled hay was scattered across the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer left the unbaled hay in the barn.
meanings.sent3: The unbaled hay seemed to have a mind of its own, rolling around in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The unbaled hay lay like a golden carpet in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The unbaled hay smelled fresh and earthy, reminding me of summer days.

meanings.definition: Not bundled or packaged in bales
meanings.sent1: The unbaled cotton was piled up in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The unbaled newspapers were stacked haphazardly in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The unbaled books looked like they were having a party on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The unbaled wires snaked across the floor like a tangled mess.
meanings.sent5: The unbaled goods were scattered everywhere, creating a chaotic scene.
